Yugeng Liu

Ph.D. Student CISPA
Stuhlsatzenhausweg 5
66123, Saarbrücken, Germany


| Short Bio

I am a second-year Ph.D. student at CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security, co-supervised by Michael Backes and Yang Zhang. Prior to joining CISPA, I graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) with the Bachelor's degree of Computer Science and Technology in 2018. During my undergraduate study, I had been working at Network Security and Privacy Protection (NSEC) Lab, supervised by Haojin Zhu, for about 2 years.

| Research Interests

My research interests lie in the areas of Hardware Security, IoT Security, Machine Learning Security & Privacy.

Download C.V. 


| Experiences

  • 2015.7 - 2015.9    Exchange at University of Melbourne

| News
Aug 31, 2021 We have released our ML-Doctor software.
